1.name: Se7en
1.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

2.name: Empire Records
2.description: 24 hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.

3.name: Braveheart
3.description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

4.name: Heat
4.description: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

5.name: The Usual Suspects
5.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

6.name: Jumanji
6.description: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

7.name: Clueless
7.description: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

8.name: Kids
8.description: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.

9.name: Apollo 13
9.description: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

10.name: Batman Forever
10.description: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

11.name: Toy Story
11.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

12.name: GoldenEye
12.description: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

13.name: Friday
13.description: Two homies, Smokey and Craig, smoke a dope dealer's weed and try to figure a way to get the $200 they owe to the dealer by 10 p.m. that same night.

14.name: Showgirls
14.description: Nomi, a young drifter, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

15.name: Billy Madison
15.description: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

16.name: Casino
16.description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.

17.name: Twelve Monkeys
17.description: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

18.name: Mortal Kombat
18.description: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

19.name: Species
19.description: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

20.name: Waterworld
20.description: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

21.name: Congo
21.description: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

22.name: Bad Boys
22.description: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

23.name: Ghost in the Shell
23.description: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

24.name: Leaving Las Vegas
24.description: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

25.name: Sense and Sensibility
25.description: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the titular opposites.

26.name: Major Payne
26.description: A recently discharged Major, finds himself commanding a group of mismatched Cadets.

27.name: Before Sunrise
27.description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

28.name: Pocahontas
28.description: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

29.name: A Walk in the Clouds
29.description: A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.

30.name: The Basketball Diaries
30.description: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

31.name: Casper
31.description: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

32.name: Hackers
32.description: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

33.name: While You Were Sleeping
33.description: A hopeless romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.

34.name: Mallrats
34.description: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

35.name: Get Shorty
35.description: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

36.name: Desperado
36.description: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

37.name: Four Rooms
37.description: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

38.name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
38.description: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

39.name: Rob Roy
39.description: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

40.name: Judge Dredd
40.description: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

41.name: A Goofy Movie
41.description: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

42.name: La Haine
42.description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

43.name: The Quick and the Dead
43.description: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

44.name: Tank Girl
44.description: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

45.name: Copycat
45.description: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

46.name: To Die For
46.description: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

47.name: The Bridges of Madison County
47.description: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson, for four days in the 1960s.

48.name: Tommy Boy
48.description: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

49.name: Dead Man
49.description: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange North American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

50.name: Babe
50.description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.
